title: Detonation
description: “If I was meant to be controlled, I would have come with a remote.”It’s time to become the queen I was prophesied to be.The journey to save my kingdom and restore balance to the realm might break me, but I’ll be damned if I give up without one hell of a fight.I’m not that arrogant girl they all knew in my previous life. Let them underestimate me, it’ll make victory that much sweeter.I’m coming for your Anshar, and not in the way you’d like.Ash is ours.***Author Note: Detonation is a reverse harem novel that touches on some dark themes such as: molestation at a young age, rape, and PTSD flashbacks which may be triggering for some readers. This book has a 18+ warning and is intended for mature audiences. Book two in the Darkness Rising series which will end in a cliffhanger.
author: R.L. Caulder
